name: Monkey Getaway
description:
A great game about a monkey who just wants to escape the zoo.

Instructions

  1. Use wasd or arrow keys to move
  2. Escape each area to move on
  3. Use 1, 2, or 3 to select your fruit weapon
    1. Pineapple-Has a large explosion
    2. Cherry-Shoots 2 cherries in quick succession(only 1 ammo consumed)
    3. Blueberry-A shotgun-like shot
  4. Use 'e' to interact with the world

Features

  1. An interactive zoo for you to explore and escape
